title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.22 - Identification of games of chance devices and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.22 - Identification of games of chance devices and equipment

State Regulations

No licensed supplier shall sell or lease any type of
games of chance devices and equipment unless there has been permanently and
prominently marked thereon the name and license number of the
supplier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.22

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
